about_the_game:
【Game Background】
Travel across the universe and meet aliens.
Commander, we are about to land on the planet Parola.
The human planet has just experienced a long history of confrontation and awakening.
After the interstellar immigration plan was launched, we discovered this mysterious planet, Parola, which is extremely similar to the earth.
Along with the opportunities, there are also challenges from huge mechanical synthetic beasts and unknown forces on the planet.

Lost world, a new adventure.
Meet partners who fight side by side, form and lead a special operations team to fight against the threat of mechanical beasts, collect particle energy, reveal the truth and conspiracy hidden on this planet, or explore the former glory of this civilization. Please try to get as many answers as possible.

Your journey starts from this moment.

【Game Features】
"Magic Steampunk, unique visual experience"
The game art performance is based on the "Baroque" art style for cartoon evolution, with steampunk, machinery, and magic elements to form an independent game style, and use this style as the tone to build an alien world with diverse terrains.

"Legion expedition, extreme competition and combat strategy"
There are many mineral resources with special powers on the planet Parola. In addition to mining by themselves, players can also form a legion to deploy base vehicles to collect resources more efficiently. Resources are limited, competition and confrontation are inevitable, formulate strategies to make friends with allies to obtain the most resources!

"Six major professions, strategy to create exclusive combat schools"
The new version has added a large number of characters, from the original 18 characters to 40+ characters. Team building is one of the core strategies of the game. Players can recruit different heroes in the tavern and form different teams to deal with different enemies.

"Casual fishing, super rich gameplay and unlimited fun"
Fishermen, please pay attention! On the planet Parola, players can collect different fish through fishing gameplay and put them in their own aquariums. Happy gathering activities between players, including barbecue, answering questions and other fun games are also displayed everywhere in the game, and a relaxed and casual gaming experience is waiting for you to explore.

"Reducing the burden of the game, leaving it idle and inheriting it without loss"
Leaving it idle, easily obtain massive resources; automatic combat, easy use of fragmented time; lossless inheritance, no longer have to worry about waste of resources due to mistakes in cultivation, one-click lossless inheritance, a variety of lineups waiting for you to experience

"Personalized dress, free to match exclusive image"
Commanders can make various auxiliary combinations to create their own personalized style. Paruola fashion, led by you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G5400 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GeForce 710 / AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / Nvidia GeForce 720 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
